tasks.task: Purchase healthy chicks from reliable suppliers.
subtasks: Research suppliers to ensure quality.
Transport chicks carefully to avoid stress.
Set up brooders in a warm area.
Install central heating around the brooders.
Monitor temperature regularly and adjust as needed.

tasks.task: Ensure proper ventilation and prevent suffocation.
subtasks: Keep areas well-ventilated to manage temperature evenly.
Position feeders and waterers away from heat sources.
Avoid using loud equipment near the chicks.
Regularly clean and disinfect water containers.
Replace water daily and offer it before feed.
Provide adequate feed量, adjusting as chicks grow.
Educate oneself on common poultry diseases.
Consult veterinarian for vaccination advice.
Adhere to medication schedules as directed.

tasks.task: Prevent ammonia buildup in chicken housing.
subtasks: Regularly remove waste and litter.
Ensure proper air circulation to dry bedding.
Clean the chicken house periodically.
Wash hands and change clothes before handling chickens.
Keep tools and equipment clean.
Segregate sick birds to prevent spreading.
Check fencing and shelter for vulnerabilities.
Use netting or other barriers to deter climbing predators.
Remove potential attractants like spilled feed near the coop.

tasks.task: Follow best practices for household management.
subtasks: Maintain clean drinking water at all times.
Ensure birds are well-fed and well-hydrated.
Regularly inspect chickens for signs of illness.

tasks.task: Subscribe to relevant resources or channels for ongoing support.
subtasks: Research and select a suitable subscription service.
Sign up for a subscription to receive updates and guidance.
Engage with community for advice and troubleshooting.
